[
    FullOpeningTag(
        FullOpeningTagStatement {
            span: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 1,
                position: 0,
            },
        },
    ),
    Declare(
        DeclareStatement {
            declare: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 7,
                position: 6,
            },
            entries: DeclareEntryGroup {
                left_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 14,
                    position: 13,
                },
                right_parenthesis: Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 20,
                    position: 19,
                },
                entries: [
                    DeclareEntry {
                        key: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 1,
                                column: 15,
                                position: 14,
                            },
                            value: "A",
                        },
                        equals: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 16,
                            position: 15,
                        },
                        value: String(
                            LiteralString {
                                value: "'B'",
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 1,
                                    column: 17,
                                    position: 16,
                                },
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ],
            },
            body: Noop {
                semicolon: Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 21,
                    position: 20,
                },
            },
        },
    ),
]
